name: Gold Lust Dry Heat Protection Spray
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: A styling spray for dry hair that provides 450u00b0F heat protection while repairing damaged strands and adding instant softness, leaving hair with a frizz-free satin finish..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Frizz.- Heat Protection.-Damage/Split Ends/Breakage..Key Benefits: - Heat protects up to 450u00b0F.- Repairs, conditions, and nourishes damaged strands.- Intensely softens, adds silkiness, and smooths flyaways and frizz for a polished finish..Highlighted Ingredients:- Bio-Restorative Complex (Plant Collagen, Caffeine, Biotin, and Niacinamide): Targets cuticle damage, fortifies, intensely nurtures, and visibly restores youthfulness while penetrating the root to energize the scalp and rejuvenate the hair follicles..- Brassica Oil Copolymer: Is a biodegradable, plant-based ingredient that forms a shield around strands to protect against hot tools..- Coconut Water and Marine Algae Extract: Intensely nurture and hydrate damaged strands, unveiling healthier, more youthful-looking hair...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Protect your hair from hot tools while restoring it to a soft, ultra-healthy, youthful-looking state with this multitasking, dry-conditioning spray. The vegan formula supports, nurtures, and shields damaged strands up to 450u00b0F, leaving hair immediately silky-soft with a frizz-free finish...Fragrance Description: Created in collaboration with one of the oldest French fragrance houses, Oribeu2019s signature scent, Cu00f4te du2019Azur, features sun-drenched notes of Calabrian bergamot, white butterfly jasmine, and sandalwoodu2014embodying the glamour and heat of the legendary destination.
ingredients: -Bio-Restorative Complex: Targets damage on the cuticle, fortifies, intensely nurtures, and restores the look of youthfulness while penetrating the root to energize the scalp and rejuvenate hair follicles..-Brassica Oil Copolymer: A biodegradable botanical-based polymer that creates a shield around strands to protect from hot tools..-Coconut Water and Marine Algae Extract: Intensely nurtures and hydrates damaged strands to unveil healthier-, more youthful-looking hair...Isobutane, SD Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Butane, Diisopropyl Adipate, Parfum/Fragrance, Ethyl Macadamiate, Silicone Quaternium-3, Glycereth-26, Panthenyl Ethyl Ether, Aqua/Water/Eau, Trideceth-12, Quaternium-91, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Phytantriol, Quaternium-95, Propanediol, Caffeine, Biotin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Niacinamide, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, Glycerin, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Liquid Endosperm, Hypnea Musciformis Extract, Tocopherol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Litchi Chinensis Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Malic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Leontopodium Alpinum Flower/Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Vegetable Amino Acids, Sodium Carrageenan, Phenoxyethanol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Galactoarabinan, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Xylitol, Trehalose, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Ethyl Linoleate, Ethyl Oleate, Sorbitan Oleate, Polyquaternium-37, Caprylic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake and spray onto dry hair to instantly condition and protect against hot tools....Recycling Instructions:.-The spray comes in a recyclable aluminum can with a 100 percent PCR cap..-All of Oribeu2019s paper-based packaging is made from materials certified by the Forest Stewardship Council.
